subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: new font released
msgSnippet: ... Thanks for the compliments. I can easily change Yo-yo, but I m confused how to do so. Should it be more flat at the top? Right now it is a perfectly
messageBody:
oliver langan wrote:
>
>
> Overall I like Thoth quite a lot: very clean. I do agree that Yo-yo
> looks a lot like an orthodox P, but even that does not concern me too
> much since I believe context will win out.
>

Thanks for the compliments. I can easily change Yo-yo, but I'm confused
how to do so. Should it be more flat at the top? Right now it is a
perfectly symetric curve in relation to the stem.

Paul
